name: observable-hooks
description: React hooks for RxJS Observables. Simple, flexible, testable and performant.
author: CRIMX<straybugs@gmail.com>

scripts.build: shx rm -rf dist && yarn build:esm && yarn build:cjs
scripts.build:esm: shx rm -rf dist/esm && cross-env NODE_ENV=production tsc -p tsconfig.build.json --module es2015 --outDir dist/esm
scripts.build:cjs: shx rm -rf dist/cjs && cross-env NODE_ENV=production tsc -p tsconfig.build.json --module commonjs --outDir dist/cjs
